```{r}

a <- 1/(3*(2/3)^2*(1-(2/3)))
f  <- function(x) (1/3)*x*(1+x)*exp(-x)
g  <- function(x) (2/3)^2*x*exp(-(2/3)*x)

#Length of x in graph and turn to dataframe to make graphable
df <- data.frame(x=seq(0,20))
df$f  <- f(df$x)
#minimizing value times g(x)
df$cg <- a*g(df$x)
#Graph
ggplot(df, aes(x))+
  geom_line(aes(y=f)) +
  geom_line(aes(y=cg))

```
